Requirements You're wielding a gun.

You aim your shots to unbalance your foe, pushing them back or knocking them over. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Aim] and then make a ranged Strike against your mark. If the Strike hits, the target is knocked back 5 feet. If this forced movement would cause them to collide with a creature or object, both the target and the creature (if any) take bludgeoning damage equal to your Aim damage. On a critical hit, the target is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Prone].
